name: Hampton Inn Littleton

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was our first stay at a Hampton Inn and we were very impressed - we more often use Holiday Inn/Express and this was definitely better.
reviews.title: First time at a Hampton Inn

reviews.text: The hotel is light, clean and spacious. Our room was well furnished and very comfortable with free broadband connection that worked first time (not always the case).
reviews.title: Great place
Nice place
reviews.text: All staff we encountered were friendly.

description: Hampton Inn Littleton, New Hampshire. Discover white mountain hotel with value accommodations featuring numerous specials and packages. Located near major ski and golf resorts, amusement parks, scenic attractions and more.
